name: Baldi's Basics Remake Edition (Scratch Mod)
description:
Credits to Mystman12 

W A S D Keys To Move

R to Run

Space to show the Map

Click Baldi to Have the Apple (if you have the apple item)

How to Open the file:

Open the HTML File.

Then it's gonna load, click full screen.

And then it's done!

(WORKS FOR ONLY GOOGLE CHROME)
